meanings.definition: a period of time equal to 60 minutes
meanings.sent1: I have to wait for an hour before the movie starts.
meanings.sent2: She wakes up every morning at the same hour.
meanings.sent3: It took an hour for the snail to cross the sidewalk.
meanings.sent4: The hour flew by like a speeding train.
meanings.sent5: The hour felt like a never-ending marathon of waiting.

meanings.sent1: Lunch hour is my favorite time of the day.
meanings.sent2: He always arrives at the office at the same hour.
meanings.sent3: The hour when the sun sets is magical.
meanings.sent4: The hour of dawn whispered secrets to the night.
meanings.sent5: The hour of midnight held a mysterious allure.

meanings.definition: a unit of time equal to 1/24 of a day
meanings.sent1: There are twenty-four hours in a day.
meanings.sent2: The meeting is scheduled for the eleventh hour.
meanings.sent3: The hour hand on the clock moved slowly.
meanings.sent4: The hour felt like a tiny fraction of eternity.
meanings.sent5: The hourglass measured time in delicate grains of sand.
